data.name: Caribbean Jigsaw
data.detailed_description:
Caribbean Jigsaw - solve the puzzles of old pirate and find the treasure! In this game a player assembles a picture of certain number of puzzle elements. Two game modes - easy and casual. Player drags pieces and this way assembles a picture.
Puzzle pieces can be rotated and put in special pocket. Small pieces are better to look at using special magnifying glass. For each puzzle player can change the number of pieces from 12 to 300.
Thanks to possibility to control game difficulty Caribbean Jigsaw is replayable and suitable for players of any age. Get all the picture puzzles done!

- High quality unique pictures
- Custom styles of pieces with rotation
- Ambient, relaxing sound
- Save game progress anytime
- Unlimited game time
- Awesome art style
- Optional game difficulty control
- Many unique puzzles in truly pirate style.

data.short_description: Caribbean Jigsaw - solve the puzzles of old pirate and find the treasure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 x64
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 35 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 35 MB available space
